name: project_player_desktop
description: A multi-modal streaming player for local resources
author: Miles Player Team

scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "yarn --cwd frontend dev --host 127.0.0.1 --port 5173" "wait-on http://127.0.0.1:5173 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development ELECTRON_DEV_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5173 electron ."
scripts.dist: yarn install:backend && yarn prepare:backend && yarn build && electron-builder --win dir --publish never
scripts.dist:win: yarn install:backend && yarn prepare:backend && yarn build && electron-builder --win dir --publish never
scripts.dist:win:nsis: yarn install:backend && yarn prepare:backend && yarn build && electron-builder --win nsis --publish never
scripts.dist:win:all: yarn install:backend && yarn prepare:backend && yarn build && electron-builder --win --publish never
scripts.dist:mac: yarn install:backend && yarn prepare:backend && yarn build && electron-builder --mac --publish never
